title: Scotch egg with homemade vegetable crisps
description: This is James Martin’s easy take on pub snacks - great to prepare for a night in with friends.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz plain flour, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 large sweet potato, peeled and finely sliced on a mandoline
2 medium potatoes, peeled and finely sliced on a mandoline
2 raw beetroot, finely sliced on a mandoline
2 carrots, finely sliced on a mandoline
salt and freshly ground black pepper
